appContext: This is a example for the testing the package to translate and update translation files using OpenAI

welcomeScreen.context: This screen is the first screen of the app to welcome the user

mainScreen.context: This screen is the main screen of the app

OpenModalButton.context: This component is a button to modal in the app

nameInput.context: This component is a name input

text.context: This text mean to be used everywhere accross the app

unit.context: Localize the unit according to the language of the file
